nodes.documentation:
Let's tip an author.
We will get the post id and tip its author.
The payable keyword enable a function or address to transfer or receive Eth.
nodes.name: tipPost

nodes.documentation:
Comment on post.
We will need the id of the post and the content of the comment
to add the comment on the block chain
